comments.content: you put up a HARD question. and it leads to another by asking "how many of us have actually read this book?" Or perhaps the not so famous film 7 years ago... Good luck on ya...

Though I haven't read the novel, but I've watched the movie few years ago. Maybe you can start from considering who among the characters you want to discuss about. Why the mum wanted to have her second daughter to be born? Does she love her or not? Why the older sister wanted to die? Why didn't the younger sister hate her sister? There are tons of stuff you can write about!
